title: Kari Lake
added: Lake filed paperwork to run for [[governor of Arizona]] for the [[2022 Arizona gubernatorial election|2022 election]] on June 1, 2021.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.azcentral.com/story/news/politics/elections/2021/06/01/kari-lake-run-republican-nomination-arizona-governor-fox-anchor/7497805002/|title=Another GOP candidate jumps into governor's race: Former TV anchor Kari Lake files paperwork to run|first=Andrew|last=Oxford|work=[[The Arizona Republic]]|date=June 1, 2021}}</ref> Previously that year, she purchased a PRO account on Gab, a social media platform popular with white supremacists.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Baxter|first=Erasmus|title=Not On TV, Kari Lake Is Active on Site for Right-Wingers, Nazis|url=https://www.phoenixnewtimes.com/news/not-on-tv-kari-lake-is-active-on-site-for-right-wingers-nazis-11526832|access-date=2021-08-28|website=Phoenix New Times|language=en}}</ref> During the campaign, she aligned herself with Donald Trump.<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|title='Take the mask and shove it': Kari Lake leads anti-mask rally at ASU. Here are 5 takeaways|url=https://www.12news.com/article/news/politics/take-mask-shove-kari-lake-leads-anti-mask-rally-asu-here-are-5-takeaways/75-259493f8-7cd5-4b01-b183-ac067d39fd43|access-date=2021-08-28|website=12news.com|language=en-US}}</ref> She falsely claimed that Trump won Arizona in the 2020 election.<ref>{{Cite web|title=‘It’s spreading’: Phony election fraud conspiracies infect midterms|url=https://www.politico.com/news/2021/09/20/election-fraud-conspiracies-infect-midterms-512783|access-date=2021-09-20|website=POLITICO|language=en}}</ref> She attended events headed by the "My Pillow Guy" Mike Lindell who was a prominent promoter of false claims regarding fraud in the 2020 election.<ref name=":0" />

In August 2021, Lake led anti-mask rallies.<ref name=":0" /> She called on Arizona State University students to violate the university's mask requirement policy.<ref name=":0" /> Lake said she would not tolerate mask requirements and vaccine requirements during the COVID-19 pandemic.<ref>{{Cite web|date=2021-08-10|title=Kari Lake is trying to make the jump from TV news to governor of Arizona. Can she do it?|url=https://www.abc15.com/news/state/kari-lake-is-trying-to-make-the-jump-from-tv-news-to-governor-of-arizona-can-she-do-it|access-date=2021-08-28|website=KNXV|language=en}}</ref>
